title: Luis Enrique - Wikipedia
snippet: At the 2022 World Cup, Enrique's team were defeated in the round of 16 following another shootout, 3–0 against Morocco. In the wake of this performance, he stepped down from his position. title: Luis Enrique appointed Paris Saint-Germain head coach after Christophe Galtier exit - The Athletic
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain have confirmed the appointment of Luis Enrique as their new head coach. Luis Enrique succeeds Christophe Galtier, whose departure after one year in charge was announced just hours earlier on Wednesday.
